examples.sentence:
The correct network speed for the local server is 800–900 Mbps. The network speed in this server is 950 Mbps.

 The network speed in this server is ………………….

content.sentence:
The safe operating temperature of the server room is 20–25 degrees Celsius. The temperature in this server room is 28 degrees Celsius.

 The temperature in this server room is ………………….

The correct voltage for the power supply unit is 230 volts. The voltage in this PSU is 240 volts.

 The voltage in this PSU is ………………….

The acceptable latency for network connections is 10–20 milliseconds. The latency in this connection is 8 milliseconds.

 The latency in this connection is ………………….

The standard backup frequency for the database is once every 24 hours. The current backup interval is once every 48 hours.

 The backup interval is ………………….

The ideal CPU utilization for this server is 40–60 percent. The CPU utilization of this server is 75 percent.

 The CPU utilization of this server is ………………….

The safe humidity level for ICT equipment is 40–50 percent. The humidity in the server room is 30 percent.

 The humidity in the server room is ………………….

The recommended length of a patch cable is less than 100 centimeters. The length of this patch cable is 120 centimeters.

 The length of this patch cable is ………………….

The standard capacity of the UPS for this lab is 5 kilovolt-amperes (kVA). The UPS in this lab is 4 kVA.

 The UPS in this lab is ………………….

The correct disk usage level for safe operation is below 80 percent. The disk usage on this server is 90 percent.

 The disk usage on this server is ………………….

The acceptable packet loss rate is below 1 percent. The packet loss rate in this network is 2 percent.

 The packet loss rate in this network is ………………….

activity_a.text:
Listen to the audio which will be played twice and click on the correct answer. It is very important that you read the questions before you listen to the recording.
ඔබට සෑම පටිගත කිරීමක්ම දෙවරක් ඇසෙනු ඇත. නිවැරදි පිළිතුර ක්ලික් කරන්න. රෙකෝඩින් එක අහන්නට පෙර ප්‍රශ්නය කියවීම ඉතාමත් වැදගත්ය.
ஒவ்வொரு ஒலிப்பதிவையும் நீங்கள் இருமுறை கேட்கலாம். கேட்ட எண்களை குறித்து எழுதுங்கள். பதிவைக் கேட்பதற்கு முன் கேள்விகளைப் படிப்பது மிகவும் முக்கியம்.
